events.name: HackDUCS
description_paragraphs: Embark on a coding odyssey at HackDUCS â€“ Delhi University's epic hackathon where ideas evolve, friendships form, and innovation takes centre stage!
For the first time at the University of Delhi, the Department of Computer Science is organizing HackDUCS, a hybrid inter-college hackathon as part of its 20th Annual TechFest - Sankalan 2024.
Tentative Event Schedule - all times in IST

DAY 0
  • 11:00 AM - Registrations Closed
  • 12:00 PM - Tracks Released

DAY 1
  • 12:00 PM - Presentation Submissions Due
  • 12:30 PM - Presentation Order Communicated
  • 01:00 PM - Preliminary Presentations Begin on GMeet/Zoom
  • 05:00 PM - Preliminary Presentations End
  • 07:00 PM - Results of Preliminary Round Declared
  • 08:00 PM - Instructions Communicated to Semi Finalist Teams

DAY 2 (Sankalan Day 1)
  • 09:00 AM - Offline Reporting (as feasible) and Disbursement of Event Kits
  • 10:00 AM - Inauguration and Workshop / Keynote - Hacking Begins

DAY 3 (Sankalan Day 2)
  • 09:00 AM - Offline Reporting
  • 10:00 AM - Prototype Demonstrations Begin (Hybrid)
  • 11:30 AM - Prototype Demonstrations End
  • 12:00 PM - Results of Demonstrations Declared and Communicated to Finalist Teams
  • 03:00 PM - Final Presentations Begin (Hybrid)
  • 05:00 PM - Final Presentations End
  • 05:30 PM - Results of Final Presentations / Winners Declared
  • 06:00 PM - Prize Disbursement Formalities
rules: These rules are tentative and are subject to change

• Eligibility: College/University Students; Team Size: 2-4; Cross-college teams allowed
  • Tracks will be released on Day 0 at 12:00 PM.
  • Development must start after release of tracks.
  • Projects submitted to other hackathons will not be considered.
  • Plagiarism will lead to disqualification.
  • Preliminary Presentations:
  • Online presentations on Google Meet / Zoom.
  • Time Limit: 12-15 mins (8 mins + questions)
  • Slides: Maximum of 12 slides; Formats: .pptx, .pdf
  • Maximum of 5 teams from each track will be selected for demos
  • Final Prototype Demos:
  • In-person project demonstration at event venue. Time Limit: 12-15 mins
  • Project must be submitted on Devfolio before the presentation begins.
  • Project source code must be hosted on a public repository on GitHub.
  • Short video demo needs to be uploaded on YouTube and submitted on Devfolio.
  • 10 teams qualify for Final Presentations
  • Final Presentations:
  • No Time Limit ðŸ™‚
  • In-person presentation at event venue.
  • Qualified teams must arrange for travel and accommodation.
  • Food and beverages will be provided as part of the parent event.

events.name: Algoholics
description_paragraphs: Algoholics is a journey into the heart of algorithmic mastery, inspired by the words of Kristian Vistrup Madsen: "Programming is not about typing, it's about thinking, and algorithms are the way we express that thinking." We celebrate the art of problem-solving through coding puzzles, challenging you to unravel complexities with the utmost efficiency in space and time.
Platform - TBA
Tentative Event Schedule - all times in IST

ONLINE PRELIMS (Sankalan Day 1)
  • 10:30 AM - Reporting
  • 11:00 AM - Event begins
  • 12:00 PM - Event Ends

OFFLINE MAINS (Sankalan Day 2)
  • 10:30 AM - Offline Reporting
  • 11:00 AM - Event Begins
  • 12:00 PM - Event Ends

events.name: Blind Coding
description_paragraphs: Venture into uncharted territory where screens remain dark, and ingenuity lights the way. No internet, no chatter â€“ just you, your code, and the thrill of the challenge. Blind Coding offers a thrilling opportunity to push your limits and experience the adrenaline rush of coding like never before.
Tentative Event Schedule - TBA
rules:
• Assemble your dream team of two adventurers (Only Two Members Are Allowed).
  • You'll have 60 minutes to conquer two coding problems - one of easy difficulty, and the other of medium complexity.
  • A total of 40 marks are up for grabs, with 15 marks dedicated to the easy problem and 25 marks for the medium one.
  • Exercise caution! Teams can briefly activate their screens twice for 30 seconds each, but beware, as a penalty of 5 points will be incurred per activation, closely monitored by our organizers.
  • Food and beverages will be provided as part of the parent event.
  • Success and efficiency are key! Priority will be given to code that executes flawlessly with the most optimal solution.
  • In the event of errors, elegance prevails! The second preference will go to code with the fewest errors.
  • In the case of a tiebreaker, timing is everything. The submission time will serve as the final determinant.
  • Decisions made by the event organizers will be final and binding.

events.name: Code Auction
description_paragraphs: Codes are up for auction, but being the highest bidder is not enough to win the game! Call for coding enthusiasts who want to experience a thrilling journey of problem-solving, strategising, and collaboration. Some team members will participate in an auction, bidding for the challenges you wish. And the rest of the team will try to crack the code within a set time limit. Do you know your friends well enough to bid on the challenge suited for them? Join us at Code Auction to know!
Tentative Event Schedule - TBA

events.name: Squash the Bugs
description_paragraphs: Squash some bugs and showcase your coding prowess! Dive into our code snippets, identify the bugs lurking within, and apply your programming wizardry to squash them into oblivion. Every bug fix brings you one step closer to the top of the scoreboard and ultimate glory. Prizes await the top bug squashers, but the real reward lies in the satisfaction of overcoming challenges and mastering the art of debugging.
Tentative Event Schedule - TBA

events.name: Chakravyuh
description_paragraphs: Welcome, brave adventurers, to "Unearth the Treasure" - an exhilarating Chakravyuh that will test your wit, teamwork, and courage! Get ready to embark on an unforgettable journey filled with clues, puzzles, and excitement.
Tentative Event Schedule - TBA
rules: There's only one rule: be the first team to find all the clues and claim victory!

events.name: Click-Akrity
description_paragraphs: Greetings from Click Akrity, where the attendees are not only mere spectators but active documentarians! This extraordinary photography event invites aspiring photographers to register and embark on a mission to capture the essence of the entire event. A thrilling blend of originality, ability, and the art of storytelling through the lens, Click Akrity is high stakes because each participant must submit their two best images for the ultimate selection. Don't miss your chance to capture the moment and be part of this spectacular visual extravaganza!

The ultimate photography event where you're not just a viewer but also a storyteller! Armed with your camera, embark on a mission to craft immersive visual tales that showcase the spirit of our gathering. Every participant can submit three photos that best capture the theme - Diversity in Community. It's a thrilling mix of creativity, skill, and storytelling through the lens. Don't miss the chance to seize the moment and be part of this spectacular visual showcase.
Theme - Diversity in Community

events.name: Desktop Dominion
description_paragraphs: Join us for an electrifying celebration of desktop gaming where we delve into the immersive world of digital entertainment! Whether you're a seasoned gamer or just starting your journey, this event promises to captivate and inspire with a plethora of activities and experiences tailored to every gaming enthusiast.
Counter Strike Global Offensive (CSGO) LAN Party
Dive into Heart-Pounding Counter-Strike Action at Our CSGO Gaming Event! Engage in Intense Tactical Battles, Strategize with Your Team, and Aim for Victory in the Ultimate FPS Showdown.
